column2: Amai Mugabe Vokurudzira Murume Wavo Kudzinga Amai Mujuru
column3: Mudzimai wemutungamiri wenyika, Amai Grace Mugabe, vakurudzira murume wavo uye vari mutungamiri wenyika, Va Robert Mugabe, kuti vadzinge basa mutevedzeri wavo, Amai Joice Mujuru, avo vavari kupomera mhosva yekuronga zvekubvisa Va Mugabe pachigaro vachishandisa chisimba. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita neMuvhuro nevadzidzi vemuzvikori zvepamusoro soro pamwe nevatsigiri ve Zanu PF, Amai Mugabe vakurudzira VaMugabe kuti vadzinge basa Amai Mujuru avo vavave nenguva vachiti vanofanira kusiya basa. Zvichitevera mashoko akabuda mubepanhau re Sunday Mail neSvondo ekuti Amai Mujuru vaironga zvekuuraya VaMugabe, Amai Mugabe vati vane humbowo hwevhidhiyo inoburitsa pachena kuti Amai Mujuru vairongawo kuvauraya ivo pachezvavo. Vati Amai Mujuru vari kupihwa mari nehurumende dzekunze yavari kushandisa muhurongwa hwekuda kubvisa hurumende zvisiri pamutemo Vaenderera mberi vachiti nekuda kweizvi, Amai Mujuru vanofanirwa kusungwa vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kupidigura hurumende. Vatiwo kubva zvavakagadzwa semutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, hapana chavakaita chinoratidza kuti vaimirira zvido zvemadzimai munyika. Vatiwo vachashanda zvakasimba kuti makurukota ese ehurumende pamwe nevatevedzeri vaVa Mugabe vachasarudzwa pakongiresi ye Zanu PF vanogona kuvadzingisa zvakare kana vasiri kuita zvinhu nemazvo. Tabata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi vakati vari mumusangano vachatifonera kana vapedza zvavari kuita. Asi mashoko avakaburitsa nezuro anoti havana chavanoziva nezvenyaya dziri kutaurwa mazuvano naAmai Mugabe pamwe nevamwe vari muZanu PF avo vari kuvapomera mhosva yehuori, kusagona basa pamwe nekutengesa kune venyika dzekunze. Vanoti vakatosvitsa nyaya iyi kumagweta avo kuti atore matanho pamusana pekusvibiswa kuri kuitwa zita ravo. Zvichakadai, mutungamiri wesangano re Zimbabwe Congress of Students iro rinobuda pachena kuti rinotsigira Zanu PF, Va Leopold Chakanyuka, vaudza vanhu vanga vari pamusangano uyu kuti gurukota rezvedzidzo yepamusoro, Amai Olivia Muchena, pamwe negurukota rinoona nezvevechidiki, Va Francis Nhema, vanofanira kusiya mabasa avo nhasi chaiye vachipomera vaviri ava mhosva yekusakoshesa zvido pamwe nezvirongwa zvevechidiki pamwe nevadziddzi. Zvichakadai, Amai Mugabe vati vanhu vese vari kutsigira Amai Mujuru vachatorerwa matanho akaomarara mu Zanu PF. No media source currently available

column2: Amai Makarau Vanoramwa Kupinda Musangano Vachiti Vaneta neKunyombwa
column3: Musangano wange wakarongwa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika watadza kuitwa muHarare neChipiri mushure mekunge sachigaro weZEC, Justice Rita Makarau, vabuda mumusangano uyu vachiti vaneta nekubatwa neseri kweruwoko nemapato aya. Amai Makarau, avo vange vakatsamwa zvikuru, vaudza vamiriri vemapato aya, kuti semaonero avo, misangano yavanoita nemapato aya haisi kushanda nekuti nekudaro vachagara pasi seZEC voona kuti voita sei. Vati mapato aya anovashoropodza nekutaura zvisina kunaka pamusoro pavo mumapenhau nyaya dzinofanira kutaurwa mumusangano wakaita sewange uchifanira kuitwa neChipiri. Amai Makarau vapawo mapato muenzaniso wenyaya dzakabuda mumapenhau eThe Daily News pamwe NewsDay uye vati havasi kuzobvuma kuramba vachibatwa neseri kurowoko nemapato aya. Vatiwo musangano wanhasi wange usinei nekuda kuratidzira kuri kuda kuitwa mangwana nemamwe mapato ange auya kumusangano uyu. Amai Makarua vabva vaudza dzimwe nhengo dzeZEC nevashandi vekomisheni iyi kuti vabude muimba mange muchifanira kuitirwa musangano uyu ndokuenda kuhofisi kwavo vachisiya vamiriri vemapato aya vari vega. Asi izvi hazvina kufadza vamiriri vemapato ange auya kumusangano. Vamwe vamiriri vemapato aya vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naAmai Makarau kuvashora zvakanyanya uye vanofanira kuziva kuti vanobhadharwa nemari yemitero inobhadharwa neveruzhinji rweZimbabwe. Asi mushure mechinguvana, mapato aya azobvumirana kutuma nhume dzawo kunoita musangano naAmai Makarau muhofisi mavo. Vachitaura apo vapedza musangano naAmai Makarau, munyori mukuru weMDC – T, zvakare vari mutauriri wekomiti yemapato ezvematongerwo enyika panhaurirano neZEC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, vati vaudza Amai Makarau kuti vakapedzesera vaenda kumapepanhau nekuti ZEC yange isina kupindura tsamba yavo pamusoro pekutengwa kwemichina ye Biometric Voter Registration. Asi VaMwonzora vati vazobvumirana naAmai Makarau kuti vanofanira kuramba vachiita misangano nemapato aya asi panofanira kurongwa kuti hwaro hwekuti misangano iyi ichafamba sei. Asi dzimwe nhengo dzemapato aya dzakaita saVaKudakwashe Bhasikiti vePeople First, vati mapato aya anofanira kuchisiyana neZEC otsvaga imwe nzira yekuti sarudzo dzingafambiswa sei munyika. VaKizito Kuchekwaavo vanoshanda kubazi reCommisariat reZanu PF vati bato ravo haritsigiri zvaitwa nemasangano ari muNational Electoral Reform Agenda pamwe neCoalition for Democracy uye vati semaonero avo danho ratorwa naAmai Makarau rakanaka. Zvichakadai, veNERA vanoti pamvumo yavapihwa yekuratidzira, vanzi panofanira kuungana vanhu vasingadarike zviuru zviviri nemakumi mashanu uye havasi kubvumidzwa kufamba mumigwagwa. Mapurisa anoti vanhu ava vanofanira kuungana panhandareiri kuseri kweHarare International Conference Centre uye vanhu gumi chete ndivo vachabvunmidzwa kunosiya gwaro renyunyuto kuna Amai Makarau. Mapato ari muNERA anoti haasi kufara kuti hurumende yava kuda kutora hurongwa kwekutenga michina yeBVR kubva kuUnited Nations Development Fund sezvo achifungira kuti izvi zvinoita kuti hurumende ipindire mumafambisirwo esarudzo dza2018. column2: Huwandu hweVanhu Vave Kufa neCovid-19 Hunokwira Panguva Iyo Chirwere Chadzika Midzi Munyika
column3: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neMuvhuro kuti huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika hwasvika pamakumi masere kana kuti 80, zvichitevera kushaya kwevamwe gumi. Bazi iri rakatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika yose hwakanga hwakwira kusvika pazviuru zvina nemakumi manomwe nevashanu, kana kuti 4 075, mushure mekunge vanhu zana nemakumi mashanu nevana, kana kuti 154 vawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Vanhu vapona kubva ku Covid-19 vanonzi vakanga vasvikawo pachiuru nemakumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 057. Vanhu vose vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi ndevaya vanonzi vagara vari munyika, vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika. Vanhu vanodarika chiuru nemazana maviri kana kuti 1 200, vanonzi vabatwa nechirwere ichi muHarare chete, izvo zvaita kuti rive dunhu ringanzi mwoyo wechirwere ichi pari zvino. Pasi rose Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica inoti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nemasere nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 18,300 000 vabatwa nwechirwere ichi, icho chaurayawo vanhu vanodarika zviuru mazana matanhatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvina nemazana manomwe, kana kuti 694 700. Nyanzvi mume zvehutano vari chiremba kuCharlotte kuNorth Carolina muAmerica, Dr. Simbiso Ranga, vanoti kukwira kwehuwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi pamwe nekufa nacho zvinhu zvinoshungurudza zvikuru. Dr. Ranga vanoti izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhuwo zvavo pamwe nhurumende vanofanirwa kuongorora zvakare nzira dzavari kushandisa mukudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti vaone kana dziri kushanda sezvinotarisirwa. Vanokurudzirawo vanenge varasikirwa nehama dzavo kuburukidza nechirwere ichi kuti vatore matanho akasimba anoita kuti vasatapurirwe chirwere kubva kumufi, anosanganisira kusageza mufi, uye kupfeka nhumbi dzinodzivirira kutapuriranwa kwehutachiwana.
